root.name: Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
root.description: OverviewStreet Fighter II': Hyper Fighting (known in Japan as Street Fighter II' Turbo) is a fighting game developed and published by Capcom for the CP System (CPS-1) arcade hardware on December 1992. The second derivative (hence the "dash" in the title) of Street Fighter II, Street Fighter II': Hyper Fighting tweaked the gameplay to be significantly faster while tweaking various normal and special moves (changing the speed, damage, priority, and other characteristics) and adding new special moves (such as Ryu and Ken's "Air Hurricane Kick", Dhalsim's "Yoga Teleport", and Chun-Li's "Kikoken" projectile). Each character also sports a new default color scheme, with their original schemes as alternates (with the exception of M. Bison).CharactersRyuKenE. HondaChun-LiBlankaZangiefGuileDhalsimBalrog (boss)Vega (boss)Sagat (boss)M. Bison (final boss)
